txt.en: A different visual appearance for your Orc Reaver: a black-skinned Orc wearing a leather helm, chain tunic, and heavy armour on the shoulders, arms, and shins. A sword in scabbard is worn on the back.

A different visual appearance for your Orc Reaver: a black-skinned Orc wearing a leather helm, chain tunic, and heavy armour on the shoulders, arms, and shins. A sword in scabbard is worn on the back.
